content:
Hi everyone, we are combining the Formulary and Plan-Net tracks, so please attend the Plan-Net track kickoff at https://zoom.us/j/5976870317.

Thanks!
Dave Hill
The Da Vinci kickoff, which Formulary is part of, is happening now at https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/459871733

@Dave Hill Sync-ups are scheduled to start soon based on this schedule - https://confluence.hl7.org/display/DVP/HL7+Virtual+Connectathon+-+May+2020. Please have your sync-up and review activities from today and identify next steps. We have folks jumping around to multiple tracks, so they will use this opportunity to survey what's been happening in each track. Thanks!!
